67 
68 inline void CArrowShape::EnsurePointsAreValid() const
69 {
70  if (!m_arePointsValid){
71  const i2d::CLine2d* linePtr = dynamic_cast<const i2d::CLine2d*>(GetModelPtr());
72  if (linePtr != NULL){
73  CalcPoints(*linePtr);
74  }
75  else{
76  ResetPoints();
77  }
78  m_arePointsValid = true;
79  }
80 }
